channel.title: How to change skills levels back down...plz help
channel.description:
:mad:
I am trying to find out how to change a skill on a moparscape server of mine back to a certain number like say from 99 back to 50 or something how would i do that?

item.title: How to change skills levels back down...plz help
item.dc:creator: @IP1 IP
item.description:
@IP1 wrote:

Go to your character folder --> your character file --> change the 1
99 4860000000 or whatever it is to:
60 276,742

for a list of levels and its corresponding experience please view here: Experiance/Levels Table

Read full topic
